org.ehcache.core.spi.service

Interface ServiceFactory<T extends Service>


  • public interface ServiceFactory<T extends Service>
    A factory abstraction that can create Service instances.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  ServiceFactory.RequiresConfiguration 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T create(ServiceCreationConfiguration<T,?> configuration)
      Creates an instance of the service using the passed in ServiceCreationConfiguration.
      java.lang.Class<? extends T> getServiceType()
      Queries a ServiceFactory to know which concrete Service type it produces.
      default boolean isMandatory()
      Returns true if this factory's services are mandatory in all environments.
      default int rank()
      Returns an optional ranking integer is used to choose a service factory when multiple factories are available for the same service type.

    • Method Detail

      • isMandatory

        default boolean isMandatory()
        Returns true if this factory's services are mandatory in all environments.
        Returns:
        true if this factory's services are mandatory

      • rank

        default int rank()
        Returns an optional ranking integer is used to choose a service factory when multiple factories are available for the same service type. Higher ranking value service factories are preferred.
        Returns:
        a factory ranking value

      • create

        T create(ServiceCreationConfiguration<T,?> configuration)
        Creates an instance of the service using the passed in ServiceCreationConfiguration.

        Note that a null configuration may be supported or even required by a service implementation.

        Parameters:
        configuration - the creation configuration, can be null for some services
        Returns:
        the new service, not started

      • getServiceType

        java.lang.Class<? extends T> getServiceType()
        Queries a ServiceFactory to know which concrete Service type it produces.
        Returns:
        the concrete class of the produced service.
